backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing team setup UI update and related frontend file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files including App.tsx and styling/config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React game logic handling team setup (2–20 teams), movement across levels, mini‑games, and win detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication state, login, logout, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Extended Tailwind theme variables, cosmic background styling, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling OKLCH color variables, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including existing features, a new feature request about configuring 2–20 teams, and general project metadata.
